name: timecode-csv-converter
description: Script that takes a formatted timecode script and outputs a converted csv

scripts.build: tsc && npx pkg lib/index.js --targets node14-linux-x64,node14-macos-x64,node14-win-x64 -o timecode-csv && npx rimraf executables && mkdir executables && mv timecode-csv-* executables

author: Jack Blakeston
